body_html:
importing tensorflow.contrib.layers.bow_encoder fails with a

couldn't find attribute bow_encoder on module

type error, and so I have been importing tensorflow.contrib.layers.python.layers.encoders.bow_encoder.

It is my understanding from another PR/issue that this commit will fix the imports.
body_text:
importing tensorflow.contrib.layers.bow_encoder fails with a

couldn't find attribute bow_encoder on module

type error, and so I have been importing tensorflow.contrib.layers.python.layers.encoders.bow_encoder.
It is my understanding from another PR/issue that this commit will fix the imports.
body:
importing `tensorflow.contrib.layers.bow_encoder` fails with a 

> couldn't find attribute bow_encoder on module

 type error, and so I have been importing `tensorflow.contrib.layers.python.layers.encoders.bow_encoder`.

It is my understanding from [another PR/issue](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/7569) that this commit will fix the imports.
